SUPER

ARIO

GAME DESCRIPTION

You are playing as Wario, the archnemesis of Mario! You must get to Mario's castle and kidnap Princess Peach!

Disclaimer: There is currently only 1 level. More to come...

GAME CONTROLS

Vertical movement: Left and Right Arrow Keys.

Horizontal movement: Space bar to Jump.

CREATOR INFO

All coded into a Canvas using vanilla JavaScript.
